orego.patternanalyze

Class PatternCounter2

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.patternanalyze.PatternCounter2

  • public class PatternCounter2
extends Object
    This class looks only at patterns that were actually played. These are sorted based on the ratio of patterns seen to patterns played.
    Author:
    galbraith

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUMBER_OF_NEIGHBORHOODS
      The number of total patterns, including impossible ones.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PatternCounter2() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkPatterns(File dir)
      Check for the patterns in a particular file.
      void clearOutNonsense()
      Gets rid of uncommon patterns in the hashmap to alleviate memory issues.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void setUp(String filepath)
      Takes a directory of SGF files and walks through them, counting how often patterns are seen and played.
      Long[][] sortHashMapIntoArray()
      Takes the hashMap and puts its contents into a two dimensional array of longs, then sorts the array based on the number of times we have seen a pattern.
